root.name: mcib3d library
root.description: Core Library developed by our lab for 3D image processing and analysis.
root.author: tboudier - Thomas Boudier
root.changelog:
- Version 0.0.1.19 Date 2017-06-06 10:06:53
* compatible with java6
- Version 0.0.1.18 Date 2017-06-06 06:03:46
* improved message log
- Version 0.0.1.17 Date 2017-06-06 05:18:46
* Estimated time to completion (ETC) can be displayed in the progress bar
- Version 0.0.1.16 Date 2017-06-02 05:51:54
Fix bug in adaptive filtering
- Version 0.0.1.15 Date 2017-05-24 05:16:57
Update for watershed

- Version 0.0.1.13 Date 2017-05-22 09:42:49
Pb with library name
- Version 0.0.1.12 Date 2017-05-22 09:35:53
General update

Improved watershed (much faster).
- Version 0.0.1.10 Date 2015-05-25 05:55:48
Improved Watershed (especially for flat regions)
- Version 0.0.1.9 Date 2014-10-24 10:35:30
Add watershed3D.
